{{cpp/title|stop_callback_for_t}}
{{cpp/thread/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=stop_token|since=c++26|1=
template&lt; class T, class CallbackFn &gt;
using stop_callback_for_t = T::template callback_type&lt;CallbackFn&gt;;
}}

The alias template {{tt|stop_callback_for_t}} is used to obtain the stop callback type of the type {{tt|T}}.

===Notes===
The corresponding {{tt|stop_callback_for_t}} for standard stop token types and any valid {{tt|CallbackFn}} are:
* specialization of {{c/core|std::stop_callback}} for {{c/core|std::stop_token}},
* specialization of {{c/core|std::inplace_stop_callback}} for {{c/core|std::inplace_stop_token}}, and
* unspecified type without stoppable callback registration and deregistration for {{c/core|std::never_stop_token}}.
